chunks.title: Disclosure Requirement
chunks.content: A nongovernmental corporate party must file a disclosure statement that identifies any parent corporation and any publicly held corporation owning 10% or more of its stock or states that there is no such corporation.

chunks.title: Timing of Disclosure
chunks.content: A party must file the disclosure statement with its first appearance, pleading, petition, motion, response, or other request addressed to the Court and must supplement it promptly upon any change in the information.
